title: $:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard
author: Thomas Elmiger
name: Editor Clipboard

state=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show\" type=\"nomatch\" text=\"yes\" tag=\"span\">\n{{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/unfold}}\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show\" $value=\"yes\"/>\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/TitleTemplate": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/TitleTemplate", "caption": "tags": "$:/tags/EditTemplate Clipboard", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define draft-title() [get[draft.title]]\n\\define draft-title-text() {{!!draft.title}}\n\n<$reveal type=\"match\" text=\"yes\" state=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/title-button\">\n<$button tooltip={{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/TitleTemplate!!description}} class=\"tc-btn-invisible te-cb-btn te-cb-title\">\n<$wikify name=\"d-title\" text=<>>\n<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/cb\" $field=\"te-cb-title\" $value=<>/>\n\n<$action-listops $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/cb\" $field=\"te-cb-titles\" $subfilter=<>/>\n{{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/clone}}\n\n\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icon", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "created": "20170215233105652", "modified": "20200219110755781", "tags": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/clip": { "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/import-button}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/clone": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/clone", "created": "20170216195905987", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755624", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/clone-button}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/file": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/file", "created": "20170216193254841", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755616", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/file}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/fold": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/fold", "created": "20170216193714119", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755610", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/fold-button}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/link": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/link", "created": "20170216194654940", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755604", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/link}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/transclude": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/transclude", "created": "20170216194928137", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755598", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/excise}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/unfold": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/unfold", "created": "20170216191747840", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755591", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/readme", "created": "20170216155009811", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755583", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Clipboard", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Clipboard Plugin\nThis plugin adds some handy elements to the editor interface of TiddlyWiki. Via settings you can control the appearance of:\n\n* two additional fields to store universally accessible information\n* five editor toolbar buttons (with friendly background color)\n** show/hide clipboard: ctrl+shift+C\n** show/hide preview: ctrl+shift+V\n** insert text: ctrl+shift+1\n** insert title link: ctrl+shift+2\n** insert title transclusion: ctrl+shift+3\n* a copy-title button\n** {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/TitleTemplate!!description}}: ctrl+shift+T\n\nVia the plugin’s settings you have full control over all elements, so you can use a selection that fits in your workflow. Now see what they can do for you!\n\n!!! Clipboard Field\nBelow the tags of the tiddler you can access the //Clipboard//. Here you store information you wish to access from other tiddlers you will edit later. This field is like a window to another independent tiddler: the clipboard tiddler. It is saved whenever the wiki is saved. It’s content can be inserted in the tiddlers text by clicking a button (see below).\n\n!!! Title Clipboard Field\nHere you can store – well, the title of a tiddler. You can insert it in any other tiddler you edit later on with the click of a single button – as a link or as a transclusion (see below). \n\n!!! Copy-Title Button\nNext to the title input field resides a button that copies the title of your draft to the //Title Clipboard//. \n\n!!! Editor Toolbar Buttons\nShow up to five buttons in the editor toolbar:\n\n\n\n* {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/unfold}} Show/Hide clipboard fields \n* {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/file}} Show/Hide clipboard preview: if you have stored a transclusion in your //Clipboard//, this button will produce a preview of the rendered content. Maybe you want to copy from there? Ort try to transclude `{{$:/AdvancedSearch}}` in the //Clipboard//. Very useful.\n* {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/clip}} Insert text from clipboard: transfers the //Clipboard’s// content to the position of the cursor in the editor.\n* {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/link}} Insert clipboard title as link: puts the content of the //Title Clipboard// in double square brackets and places the result at the cursor position.\n* {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/icons/transclude}} Insert clipboard title as transclusion: the same as above, but with curly brackets.\n\n\n\n!!! Tips for Advanced Users\n* Want to test a filter? Put `{{$:/AdvancedSearch}}` in your clipboard and use the fully functional preview. No need to leave your workspace.\n* Want to see the source (wikitext) of another tiddler? Put an `<$edit-text …/>` widget in the clipboard and preview … \n* Would you rather have a preview of your work as an overlay instead of side-by-side? Write `{{Draft of 'Your Tiddler Title'}}` in the clipboard – et voilà!" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-list": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-list", "created": "20170215203943180", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755565", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-text": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-text", "created": "20170215221111986", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755551", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show", "created": "20170215233218443", "modified": "20200219110755571", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "no" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/title-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/title-button", "created": "20170215211123226", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755523", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings", "created": "20170214201824205", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755576", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Clipboard", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Settings\n!!! Editor: Show Clipboard Fields\n
\n\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show\" field=\"text\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> Show clipboard\n** <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-text\" field=\"text\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> text field\n** <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/show-list\" field=\"text\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> title clipboard\n\n
\n\n!!! Editor Toolbar: Activate Buttons for the Clipboard\n
\n\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/EditorToolbar/cb\" field=\"text\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\" default=\"show\"> fold/unfold\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/EditorToolbar/cb-preview\" field=\"text\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\" default=\"show\"> clipboard preview popup\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/EditorToolbar/cb-insert\" field=\"text\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\" default=\"show\"> insert text\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/EditorToolbar/cb-insert-title-link\" field=\"text\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\" default=\"show\"> insert title as link\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/EditorToolbar/cb-insert-title-transclude\" field=\"text\" checked=\"show\" unchecked=\"hide\" default=\"show\"> insert title as transclusion\n\n
\n\n!!! Editor Title: Show Copy-Button\n
\n\n* <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/settings/title-button\" field=\"text\" checked=\"yes\" unchecked=\"no\"> Show copy-title button\n\n
\n\n<$button message=\"tm-save-wiki\" param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class=<>>\n\n<$list filter=\"[prefix[yes]]\">\n{{$:/core/images/save-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}}\n\n<$list filter=\"[prefix[yes]]\">\n<$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}}/>\n\n\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/cb.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/cb.css", "created": "20170215224423410", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755516", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet Clipboard", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* buttons */\n\n.tc-editor-toolbar button.te-cb-btn, button.te-cb-title {\n\tbackground-color: {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/colors##button-background}};\n}\n\n.tc-editor-toolbar button.te-cb-btn:hover, button.te-cb-title:hover {\n\tbackground-color: {{$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/colors##button-background-hover}};\n}\n\n.te-cb-title:hover {\n\tfill: #ffffff;\n}\n\n/* icons */\n\n.te-rotate-icon svg {\n\ttransform: rotate(180deg);\n}\n\n/* readme */\n\n.te-btn-list svg {\n\tmax-height: 1em;\n}\n\n.te-btn-list li {\n\tmargin-bottom: 0.5em;\n\tlist-style: none;\n\tmargin-left: 0em;\n\ttext-indent: -2.25em;\n}\n\n/* preview */\n\n.tc-text-editor-toolbar-clipboard {\n\tmax-width: 40em;\n\twhite-space: initial;\n}\n\n.tc-text-editor-toolbar-clipboard textarea {\n\twidth: 100%;\n}\n\n/* settings */\n\n.te-settings-list ul {\n\tlist-style: none;\n\tmargin-left: 0;\n\tpadding-left: 1.25em;\n\tline-height: 2;\n}\n\n/* editor */\n\n.tc-edit-tags {\n\tmargin-bottom: 1rem;\n}\n\n.te-cb-clipboard {\n\tmargin-bottom: .5rem;\n}\n\nbutton.te-cb-title {\n\tposition: absolute;\n\tright: 1rem;\n\tmargin-top: -.875rem;\n\tpadding-bottom: .25rem;\n\twidth: 2rem;\n\theight: 2rem;\n\tfont-size: 1.33em;\n\tfill: <>;\n\tborder-radius: .5rem;\n\ttext-align: center;\n}\n\n@media (min-width: 30em) {\n\tbutton.te-cb-title { right: .125rem; margin-top: -3.25rem; }\n}\n@media (min-width: 42em) {\n\tbutton.te-cb-title { right: 1rem; margin-top: -3.25rem; }\n}\n\n.te-cb-edittext {\n\twidth: 100%;\n\tmargin-bottom: .5rem;\n\tpadding: .5rem;\n\tborder: 1px solid <>;\n}\n\n.te-cb-select-title {\n\tmargin-top: .5rem;\n\tmargin-bottom: .5rem;\n\tfont-size: .875rem;\n}\n\n.tc-btn-invisible.te-cb-reset-titles {\n\tpadding-left: .5rem;\n\tfont-size: 1rem;\n}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/colors": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/Clipboard/style/colors", "text": "button-background: #f3e4bb\nbutton-background-hover: #c8b992", "type": "application/x-tiddler-dictionary", "created": "20170215224015656", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20200219110755509", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Clipboard" } } }
